activities:
When our customers sign in to receive product updates and other notifications on our website, purchase product, or
contact us, we may collect a variety of information, including your name, mailing address, phone number, email
address, contact preferences, and credit card information.
Mobile: When our customers download and set up apps created by Cercacor we may, collect a variety of
information such as full name, email address, mailing address, phone number, age, biological sex, or date of birth.
In addition, during the use of our apps, we may also collect information about your health/wellness, your location,
and your mobile device. When our customers download and use our mobile application, we automatically collect
information on the type of device they use, operating system version, and the device identifier (or "UDID").
The personal information we collect allows us to keep our customers posted on Cercacor’s latest product
announcements, software updates, and upcoming events.
We also use personal information to help us create, develop, operate, deliver, and improve our products, services,
content, and advertising, and for loss prevention and anti-fraud purposes.
We may personal information, including date of birth, to verify identity, assist with identification of users, and to
determine appropriate services. For example, we may use date of birth to determine the age of Cercacor account
holders.
From time to time, we may use personal information to send important notices, such as communications about
purchases and changes to our terms, conditions, and policies. Because this information is important to their
interaction with Cercacor, they may not opt out of receiving these communications.
We may also use personal information for internal purposes such as auditing, data analysis, and research to
improve Cercacor’s products, services, and customer communications.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line data = data collected directly on the Internet. Offline data = any digital data processed not through the Internet – such as data collected through an Intranet.
